version_description: Thanks for your continued interest in Wealthsimple Trade! We've fixed several small bugs in this update and have improved the overall performance and stability of the app.
Thanks for your continued interest in Wealthsimple Trade! We've fixed several small bugs in this update and have improved the overall performance and stability of the app.

Thanks for your continued interest in Wealthsimple Trade! We've made several small bug fixes and improvements:

* "Today's return" should now display correct values for all clients

* 1D portfolio earnings for clients should now return correct values

* 1D portfolio earnings for clients should now return correct values

Thanks for your continued interest in Wealthsimple Trade! We've made several small bug fixes and improvements, notably:

* 1D charts for all securities should now load correctly
* All watchlist items can now be removed (even if you own the stock)

You asked, we listened: self-directed TFSAs are now available on Wealthsimple Trade so you can earn capital gains and dividends tax-free. Get started with as little as $1 and withdraw your money anytime without penalty.

You asked, we listened: self-directed TFSAs are now available on Wealthsimple Trade so you can earn capital gains and dividends tax-free. Get started with as little as $1 and withdraw your money anytime without penalty.

You asked, we listened: self-directed TFSAs are now available on Wealthsimple Trade so you can earn capital gains and dividends tax-free. Get started with as little as $1 and withdraw your money anytime without penalty.

We’ve also made a number of improvements in this release:

* New charts! We revamped- -our graphs to improve the design, accuracy, and responsiveness
* Added bid/ask spread when placing an order
* Updated an issue affecting dollar and percent return calculations
* Performance improvements to improve app load times

We’re rolling out updates for an even better Wealthsimple Trade experience:

* New ways to search for and discover stocks. Search by category to see recent IPOs, top market gainers and more.
* Stay in-the-know with push notifications for real-time updates on orders, deposits, withdrawals and dividends.
* Update your phone number, address and employment information under settings.

* Update your phone number, address and employment information under settings.
